@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“relexlawl, post:17, topic:418046”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=520592.msg3781226#msg3781226 date=1318478384]
Couldn’t you just have done this…

public boolean isSring(int id){ if(id >= 13281 && id <= 12388) return true; return false; }
[/quote]

yup, but yet again you couldve also done

public boolean isSring(int id){ return id >= 13281 && id <= 12388; }

@asshole rule, yup idk why he made that…thats calling a random number (0-10) and if it equals 1 and players ring is 13288 then degrade[/quote]
Oh ye ik that was a while ago, ik now.

who the hell even bumped this…

item.title: Ring of slaying[pi] MY WAY [UPDATE]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“fasthop10, post:1, topic:418046”]i have no idea if this is anywhere near close to how the ring of slaying works in runescape bud i dont give a crap this is how i wanted it.

first open NpcHandeler and look for

above that add this

[code] public boolean isSring(int id){
switch (id){
case 13281: //8
case 13282: //7
case 13283: //6
case 13284: //5
case 13285: //4
case 13286: //3
case 13287: //2
case 13288: //1
return true;

	}
			return false;
	}[/code]

this is the slayer ring ids in a Boolean simply for checking purposes

then in

you should see

somewhere just under it

highlight that and replace with this

if (isSring(c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing])){ if (Misc.random(10) == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] != 13288){ c.sendMessage("you use up a charge of your ring.");//lets the player know his ring has degraded c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] += 1;//degrades the ring c.getItems().updateSlot(c.playerRing);//updates your ring slot c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE + (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE/4)), 18); }else if (Misc.random(10) == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 13288){ c.sendMessage("you use up the last charge of your ring."); c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] = -1;//removes the ring c.getItems().updateSlot(c.playerRing); c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE + (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE/4)), 18); //new 25% higher xp }else { c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE + (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE/4)), 18); } }else{ c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18);//normal xp }

this big hunk of code is quite simple all it does is change the xp to 25% more then normal if u have the ring and at a 10 % chance degrades the ring replaces it with the lower ring and updates your ring slot to the new ring and if your ring is the last one it removes and deletes the ring, then updates your ring slot.

and thats it when wearing your slayer ring players will get 25% mroe slayer xp and the ring or slaying will degrade at a 10% chance(degrades after a kill rewarding in slayer xp)

creds:
fasthop10~~me (100%) - i did not fu***** leech this.[/quote]Oo very nice gj using switch cases too.

Read full topic

item.title: Ring of slaying[pi] MY WAY [UPDATE]
item.dc:creator: @fasthop10 fasthop10
item.description:
@fasthop10 wrote:

i have no idea if this is anywhere near close to how the ring of slaying works in runescape bud i dont give a crap this is how i wanted it.

first open NpcHandeler and look for

above that add this

[code=java] public boolean isSring(int id){
switch (id){
case 13281: //8
case 13282: //7
case 13283: //6
case 13284: //5
case 13285: //4
case 13286: //3
case 13287: //2
case 13288: //1
return true;

	}
			return false;
	}[/code]

this is the slayer ring ids in a Boolean simply for checking purposes

then in

you should see

somewhere just under it

highlight that and replace with this

if (isSring(c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing])){ if (Misc.random(10) == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] != 13288){ c.sendMessage("you use up a charge of your ring.");//lets the player know his ring has degraded c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] += 1;//degrades the ring c.getItems().updateSlot(c.playerRing);//updates your ring slot c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE + (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE/4)), 18); }else if (Misc.random(10) == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 13288){ c.sendMessage("you use up the last charge of your ring."); c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] = -1;//removes the ring c.getItems().updateSlot(c.playerRing); c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE + (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE/4)), 18); //new 25% higher xp }else { c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE + (Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE/4)), 18); } }else{ c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18);//normal xp }

this big hunk of code is quite simple all it does is change the xp to 25% more then normal if u have the ring and at a 10 % chance degrades the ring replaces it with the lower ring and updates your ring slot to the new ring and if your ring is the last one it removes and deletes the ring, then updates your ring slot.

and thats it when wearing your slayer ring players will get 25% mroe slayer xp and the ring or slaying will degrade at a 10% chance(degrades after a kill rewarding in slayer xp)
